body_html: @martinwicke I took a look at this and updated to work for float32 and float64. But seems that the round operation for Eigen::half is not supported on Eigen. I think is a simple declaration of the round function, but how to proceed? Wait for Eigen? commit only the float32 and float64 version?
body_text: @martinwicke I took a look at this and updated to work for float32 and float64. But seems that the round operation for Eigen::half is not supported on Eigen. I think is a simple declaration of the round function, but how to proceed? Wait for Eigen? commit only the float32 and float64 version?
body: @martinwicke I took a look at this and updated to work for float32 and float64. But seems that the `round` operation for Eigen::half is not supported on Eigen. I think is a simple declaration of the round function, but how to proceed? Wait for Eigen? commit only the float32 and float64 version?
